Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
HaselTweaks

- Fixed: Tweaks were not notified when the config was updated.

Material Allocation

- Fixed: Config is now saved directly upon changing tabs.
- Fixed: The currently selected language in the dropdown was not highlighted.
- Fixed: Removed the language selection from the tweak config that was added there by mistake.

Portrait Helper

- Fixed: Stopped the maximum timestamp value from updating while the animation is loading.

---

Version 20.1.2 and 20.1.3 were unpublished, because I thought I had introduced a bug that prevented the plugin from initializing.
Neither of them had an issue - it was me breaking things locally. I let the CI re-build and re-release v20.1.3. Sorry for the confusion.

The changelog above reflects changes made in v20.1.2, as v20.1.3 was an attempted bugfix for said local issue.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog:
Wanted Targets

- Fixed: Detection of Sabotender Corrido didn't work because the wrong name id was used.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description:
MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).

The Rewards tab lists items of the "Newest ... Tomestone Exchange" shop with their collection status and price.  
You can also check the boxes to keep track of how many Tomestones you need at the top.

The Duties tab lists all the duties that reward Tomestones for the event.  
Clicking on a duty will open the Duty Finder with that duty selected.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
